t: Amazon.com: Customer Questions & Answers
s: Skirt measurements in the Large category: 32 inch length & 33 inch at waist which has a stretch elastic. I usually wear size M, but this L size sits comfortably. With my height of 5ft. 5" the hemline falls about 2.5 inches below my knee. Material is slightly stetchable and not clingy.
